name: NekoBooM!
detailed_description:
Game features:
- Combat system in the genre of Rhythm game.
- Movement of locations in the style of a two-dimensional platformer..
- As you progress you will meet new a variety of spooky and creepy sexual characters.
- With them you will be able to build a dialogue in the style of Japanese visual novel.
- At the end of each level you will find a battle with the boss, which will be a real test!

there Are times when the whole world turns over. First, you're the lead operative protecting the world from the most terrible villains and madmen, and the next moment around the walls of the prison, crowded with these very villains and madmen.
No one knows what happened and why now on your conscience the death of comrades. But that would get to the truth, you first have to break out. Get out of that hole, where for decades hid all the most terrible and insane.

Thank you for your work:
Andrew Warmix-for help in writing songs;
ColorMelted – for the graphics and artistic design;
Mr.W and Vladimir For an interesting plot and setting dialogs;
Null_30Bit – for producing, assembling the game, helping in the visual and sound design of the game;

Special thanks:
Moghunter, Dhoom, Yanfly - for providing scripts for creating the game!

short_description: This is an interesting story about a cat Girl-a warrior in the genre of Rhythm game with elements of a two-dimensional platformer.. Communication in the game takes place in the style of Japanese visual novel. If you're under 18, don't download because the game has R18 content with hentai scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
